meanings.definition: Air-filled cavities in the bones of the skull connected to the nasal cavity.
meanings.sent1: The doctor explained that the sinuses help to lighten the skull bones.
meanings.sent2: When I have a cold, my sinuses get blocked and cause pressure in my head.
meanings.sent3: I never realized how important sinuses were until I tried to hold my breath underwater!
meanings.sent4: Her laughter echoed through the room, bouncing off the walls like sinuses in the skull.
meanings.sent5: The sinuses are like little pockets of air keeping our heads from feeling too heavy.

meanings.definition: A feeling of discomfort or pain in the sinuses.
meanings.sent1: Every time I have a sinus headache, it feels like my head is in a vice.
meanings.sent2: Sinus pressure can make it hard to concentrate on anything else.
meanings.sent3: I tried to ignore the sinus pain, but it felt like a tiny drummer was playing in my head.
meanings.sent4: The sinus discomfort was like a nagging reminder that I needed to rest.
meanings.sent5: The pain in my sinuses was like a storm brewing inside my head, ready to burst.
